alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:19PM EST until March 08 at 3:44PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Indiana, including the following counties, Brown, Jackson, Lawrence and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 818 PM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomington, Seymour, Bedford, Brownstown, Nashville, Ellettsville, Mitchell, Crothersville, Oolitic, Morgantown, Medora, Stinesville, Charles Deam Wilderness, Norman, Elkinsville, Heltonville, Kurtz, Story, Bartlettsville and Monroe Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
